alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 3:18PM PST until February 28 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch above 1500 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Douglas County, Eastern Douglas County Foothills and Jackson County. This includes Toketee Falls and Prospect. This also includes Highway 138 east of Toketee Falls, and portions of Highways 62, 140, and 227. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
